structure.unit: A JUDICIAL SUPPORT AGENCIES AND PERSONNEL

law.catch_line: New or updated software to allow redesignation as misdemeanor if felony case concludes with only misdemeanor conviction.
law.text: The Administrative Office of the Courts shall require that any updates to or replacements of the centralized criminal history record information system established by this chapter or any case management software utilized in the offices of the Commonwealth's circuit clerks have the capability for those felony cases that reach final disposition with a conviction for a misdemeanor only to be redesignated with the same type of case designators as those used for cases that are initiated as misdemeanor cases.
law.history: Created 2013 Ky. Acts ch. 89, sec. 5, effective March 22, 2013.
